brand_identity.name: CanvasHaus
brand_identity.tagline: Turn Your Memories Into Museum-Quality Canvas Art

headings.usage: All section titles, hero headlines. Use tracking-tight for large text.

usage_rules.background: Use #0a0a0a for the main page background. Never use pure black #000000.
usage_rules.cards: Use #121212 with a 1px border of #27272A. On hover, lighten border to #D4AF37 (Gold).
usage_rules.text: Headings in #EDEDED. Body text in #A1A1AA. Never use pure white #FFFFFF for large blocks of text.
usage_rules.accents: Use Gold (#D4AF37) sparingly for buttons, active states, and thin accent lines.

grid_system.rules: Use asymmetric grids. Avoid equal-sized columns. Mix wide spans (col-span-2) with narrow spans (col-span-1).

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with bg-black/60 for sticky headers.
visual_enhancers.textures: Overlay a subtle noise texture on the background if possible to reduce digital flatness.

animations.hover: Scale up slightly (1.02) and brighten borders.

elements: Background: Dark, moody image with overlay.
CTA: Gold primary button, 'Get Early Access'.

features_grid.cards: Dark surface (#121212), 1px border, icon on top left, text bottom left.

elements: Input: Minimalist, transparent bg, bottom border only or pill shape.

images.alt: Luxury living room with large canvas art
images.usage: Hero section background with dark overlay (bg-black/70)

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Recommended: Frame, Palette, Upload, Gift, Mail, ArrowRight.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install dependencies: `npm install framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge sonner`.
2. Configure Tailwind: Add the colors and fonts to `tailwind.config.js`.
3. Create a `Layout` component that wraps the page with the dark theme background.
4. Build the `Hero` section using the provided image and typography.
5. Build the `Features` section using a CSS Grid (Bento style).
6. Build the `Waitlist` component with a form that connects to the backend (mock the fetch call if backend isn't ready).
7. Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: DO NOT use gradients for text.
Always add hover states to buttons (transform, color change).
